body: I have been trying out for moderator and Everytime I made a post, It said that the staff applications weren't open. I was just wondering when I could try out for a position.
body_tagged: I have been trying out for moderator and Everytime I made a post, It said that the staff applications weren't open. I was just wondering when I could try out for a position.
title: When do staff applications reopen?

replies.body: When we're in need of more staff members. Sr mods or higher will announce when it's time for applications!
replies.body_tagged: When we're in need of more staff members. Sr mods or higher will announce when it's time for applications!

replies.body: I'm predicting 3 or 4 more months since, from what I've seen, they open once every season or 4 months.
replies.body_tagged: I'm predicting 3 or 4 more months since, from what I've seen, they open once every season or 4 months.

replies.body: Yeah, its usually 3-4 months, or after a staff reassessment, because we lose a lot of staff there sonetimes. And apps open when we need more staff.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, its usually 3-4 months, or after a staff reassessment, because we lose a lot of staff there sonetimes. And apps open when we need more staff.
